parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to remove a policy grant.

parameters.name: entityIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the entity from which you want to remove a policy grant.

parameters.name: entityType
parameters.description: The type of the entity from which you want to remove a policy grant.

parameters.name: policyType
parameters.description: The type of the policy that you want to remove.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The principal from which you want to remove a policy grant. domainUnit (dict) --- The domain unit of the policy grant principal. Specifes the designation of the domain unit users. domainUnitGrantFilter (dict) --- The grant filter for the domain unit. allDomainUnitsGrantFilter (dict) --- Specifies a grant filter containing all domain units. domainUnitIdentifier (string) --- The ID of the domain unit. group (dict) --- The group of the policy grant principal. groupIdentifier (string) --- The ID Of the group of the group principal. project (dict) --- The project of the policy grant principal. The project designation of the project policy grant principal. projectGrantFilter (dict) --- The project grant filter of the project policy grant principal. domainUnitFilter (dict) --- The domain unit filter of the project grant filter. The domain unit ID to use in the filter. includeChildDomainUnits (boolean) --- Specifies whether to include child domain units. projectIdentifier (string) --- The project ID of the project policy grant principal. user (dict) --- The user of the policy grant principal. allUsersGrantFilter (dict) --- The all users grant filter of the user policy grant principal. userIdentifier (string) --- The user ID of the user policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: domainUnit
nested_params.description: The domain unit of the policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: domainUnitDesignation
nested_params.description: Specifes the designation of the domain unit users.

nested_params.name: domainUnitGrantFilter
nested_params.description: The grant filter for the domain unit.

nested_params.name: allDomainUnitsGrantFilter
nested_params.description: Specifies a grant filter containing all domain units.

nested_params.name: domainUnitIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: The group of the policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: groupIdentifier
nested_params.description: The ID Of the group of the group principal.

nested_params.name: project
nested_params.description: The project of the policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: projectDesignation
nested_params.description: The project designation of the project policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: projectGrantFilter
nested_params.description: The project grant filter of the project policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: domainUnitFilter
nested_params.description: The domain unit filter of the project grant filter.

nested_params.name: domainUnit
nested_params.description: The domain unit ID to use in the filter.

nested_params.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_params.description: Specifies whether to include child domain units.

nested_params.name: projectIdentifier
nested_params.description: The project ID of the project policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: user
nested_params.description: The user of the policy grant principal.

nested_params.name: allUsersGrantFilter

nested_params.name: userIdentifier
nested_params.description: The user ID of the user policy grant principal.
